scripts.build: rm -rf ../dist/wrapper-dist && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && rsync -a --include '*.json' --include '*.md' --include '*/' --exclude '*' ./src/ ../dist/wrapper-dist/ && sed -i -- 's/ANGULARFIRE2_VERSION/'"$VERSION"'/g' ../dist/wrapper-dist/*.json && sed -i -- 's/ANGULARFIRE2_VERSION/'"$VERSION"'/g' ../dist/wrapper-dist/**/*.json && rm ../dist/wrapper-dist/*.json-- && rm ../dist/wrapper-dist/**/*.json--
